text.section: In this section, "business" means a trade, professional activity, or other business that is conducted for profit.

section.section: Before a unit adopts a proposed regulation, the unit shall evaluate whether the proposed regulation has any impact on businesses.

To evaluate the impact, the unit shall:
on the basis of the sizes of the businesses that the proposed regulation might affect, divide those businesses into any classes that the unit considers appropriate for the proposed regulation; and
particularly consider:

text.section: On the basis of the evaluation, the unit may adopt 1 or more regulations that apply differently to classes of businesses.
